item.title: Create New Directory in Java using Apache Commons IO
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to create new directories using the FileUtils class of Apache Commons IO library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons IO library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons IO library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'commons-io:commons-io:2.8.0' To use the Apache Commons IO library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
